actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the printing of the House report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2172) and entitled "International Sugar Stabilization Act of 1979".

summary.text: Directs the printing of the maximum number of copies of the report accompanying H.R. 2172, the International Sugar Stabilization Act of 1979, for use of the Committee on Agriculture.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the printing of the House report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2172) and entitled "International Sugar Stabilization Act of 1979".
